name: The Riftbreaker Dedicated Server (SteamCMD + Wine + Xvfb)
author: Brandon
description:
Installs The Riftbreaker Dedicated Server (Steam Tool AppID 4114030) via SteamCMD and runs it with Wine under Xvfb (headless display).

REQUIRED ALLOCATIONS:
- UDP 6321 (game traffic)
- TCP 1127 (initial matchmaking/handshake)

Notes:
- Startup args intentionally minimal. Uses disable_steam=1.
- Uses Xvfb because the server binary still creates a window under Wine.
startup: bash -lc 'command -v xvfb-run >/dev/null 2>&1 || { echo "[error] xvfb-run not found in this yolk. Use a wine yolk that includes Xvfb (or switch yolk)."; exit 1; }; xvfb-run -a -s "-screen 0 1024x768x24" wine bin\\DedicatedServer.exe disable_steam=1'

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -euo pipefail

cd /mnt/server

APP_ID="4114030"
INSTALL_DIR="/mnt/server"
STEAMCMD_DIR="/mnt/server/steamcmd"

# Optional beta args
BETA_ARGS=""
if [[ -n "${STEAM_BETA_BRANCH:-}" ]]; then
  BETA_ARGS+=" -beta ${STEAM_BETA_BRANCH}"
  if [[ -n "${STEAM_BETA_PASSWORD:-}" ]]; then
    BETA_ARGS+=" -betapassword ${STEAM_BETA_PASSWORD}"
  fi
fi

echo "[install] Installing dependencies (SteamCMD + 32-bit runtime libs)..."
export DEBIAN_FRONTEND=noninteractive
apt-get update -y
apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends \
  ca-certificates curl tar bzip2 xz-utils \
  lib32gcc-s1 libc6-i386 lib32stdc++6

echo "[install] Fetching SteamCMD..."
mkdir -p "${STEAMCMD_DIR}"
cd "${STEAMCMD_DIR}"

if [[ ! -f "steamcmd.sh" ]]; then
  curl -fsSL "https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/client/installer/steamcmd_linux.tar.gz" -o steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
  tar -xzf steamcmd_linux.tar.gz
  chmod +x steamcmd.sh
fi

echo "[install] Running SteamCMD install/update for AppID ${APP_ID}..."
./steamcmd.sh \
  +force_install_dir "${INSTALL_DIR}" \
  +login anonymous \
  +app_update "${APP_ID}"${BETA_ARGS} validate \
  +quit

echo "[install] Verifying server binary exists..."
if [[ ! -f "/mnt/server/bin/DedicatedServer.exe" ]]; then
  echo "[install][error] Expected /mnt/server/bin/DedicatedServer.exe not found after install."
  echo "[install][hint] /mnt/server contents:"; ls -la /mnt/server || true
  echo "[install][hint] /mnt/server/bin contents:"; ls -la /mnt/server/bin || true
  exit 1
fi

echo "[install] OK: DedicatedServer.exe found."

variables.description: Optional password for the Steam beta branch (leave blank if none).
